title: My Yandere Girlfriend Won't Let Me Rest In Peace
alternative_title: My Yandere Girlfriend Won't Let Me Sleep ; Yandere Kanojo Ni Nemurasete Moraenai ; ヤンデレ彼女に眠らせてもらえない
status: My Yandere Girlfriend Won't Let Me Sleep ; Yandere Kanojo Ni Nemurasete Moraenai ; ヤンデレ彼女に眠らせてもらえない
description:
Description :
        Rei had died at the young age of 17, but as he was about to move on, he was summoned back to the realm of the living as a teddy bear by his witch girlfriend, who seeks to be together with him forever and ever.
